name: Secrets of Sequitur ~ Case 3
description:
This is the third case in the Secrets of Sequitur series! Don't forget to check out the first case if you haven't already: https://moe-blob.itch.io/secrets-of-sequitur-case-1. All cases can be found on my profile page.

Inspired by the likes of Ace Attorney and Danganronpa, the Secrets of Sequitur takes a fantasy spin on the adventure mystery genre!

Follow Kye and Goil in the fantastical kingdom of Sequitur, as they make their way in the world as rookie detectives. But it won't come easy - they will have to put their grey matter to the test in order to solve a selection of baffling mysteries!

Examine the scene of a crime in a streamlined investigation section to bolster Kye's journal and understanding of the case. Then, put your knowledge to the test in interrogations, by fighting back against your rival's incorrect theories on the case with your rebuttals. Persist through deception and come out on top by making an accusation against the true culprit!

!IMPORTANT! Pressing 'Journal' when on the 'Characters' menu and vice versa will get you trapped in a loop. Remember to save regularly! There's also a rogue < on the left-hand side of the screen for some reason--!

*****
